summary:
This mod adds colourful suited halberds to each guard of a hold.
Read the Description!
descriptionHtml:
The Beta of my Guard Weapons - Heavy Armory - Halberds mod.
This mod adds colourful suited Halberds to each guard of a hold.
 

The halberds are more realistic as guardweapons than the Greatswords or swords of the guards because in lots of Fantasy-Stuff and in the Middle Ages the Guards of towns use ALWAYS Halberds or spears.

You will need to my mod PrivateEye\'s \"Heavy Armory\", too!

Look at the screenshots.

Install it with the NMM or copy all included Data to the Skyrim\\Data folder.

The credits for the meshes go to PrivateEye!

Endorse, if you want an improved final Version!
author: GGinddi
